hero.headline: We believe every local business deserves loyal customers.
hero.description: Stampeo was born from a simple observation: paper loyalty cards get lost, and loyalty apps never get downloaded. We built the bridge — digital loyalty cards that live where your customers already are: their phone wallet.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make customer loyalty effortless for local businesses. No expensive hardware, no complex software, no friction for customers. Just a simple, beautiful digital loyalty card that works.

items.title: Simplicity First
items.description: If it takes more than 5 minutes to set up, we've failed. Every feature we build passes the simplicity test.

items.title: Built for Local
items.description: We serve the bakery on the corner, the café downtown, the salon around the block. Our features are designed for businesses that know their customers by name.

items.title: No Friction for Customers
items.description: Your customers shouldn't need to download an app or create an account. One scan, one tap — loyalty card in their wallet.

items.title: Fair Pricing
items.description: We charge what's fair and transparent. No hidden fees, no per-transaction charges, no surprises.

story.title: How It Started
paragraphs: We noticed that every café, bakery, and local shop we visited had the same problem: paper stamp cards that got lost, damaged, or forgotten. And the "solutions" out there — bloated apps that customers never download — weren't any better.
So we asked: what if the loyalty card lived in the one thing everyone already carries? Their phone wallet. No app, no login, no friction. Just scan, tap, done.
That's Stampeo. A loyalty platform built from the ground up for Apple Wallet and Google Wallet, designed specifically for local businesses who want to reward their regulars without the complexity.

cta.description: Start your digital loyalty program today.
